recipes.name: French 76
recipe: Fill Cocktail Shaker halfway with ice.
Pour Vodka, Lemon Juice, and Simple Syrup into the Cocktail Shaker.
Shake well for 15 seconds or until very cold.
Strain mix into Champagne Flute.
Top with Champagne.
Add Cocktail Cherry or Lemon Twist to garnish.
Serve.

recipes.name: Tom Collins
recipe: Fill Cocktail Shaker halfway with ice.
Pour Gin, Lemon Juice, and Simple Syrup into the Cocktail Shaker.
Shake well for 15 seconds or until very cold.
Strain mix into Collins Glass.
Top with Club Soda.
Add Cocktail Cherry and/or Lemon Wedge to garnish.
Serve.

recipes.name: Margarita
recipe: Moisten the rim of the Margarita Glass with a lime wedge.
Dip the rim into salt to coat it.
Fill the Cocktail Shaker halfway with ice.
Pour Tequila, Triple Sec, Lime Juice, and Agave Syrup into the Shaker.
Shake well for 15 seconds or until very cold.
Strain the mix into the prepared Margarita Glass.
Garnish with a Lime Wheel on the rim.
Serve.

tools.name: Cocktail Shaker
tools.description: Acts as a closed vessel that allows you to quickly and thoroughly mix ingredients together while chilling the drink at the same time.

tools.name: Jigger
tools.description: A common bar essential that acts as a cocktail measuring cup. Jiggers are dual-sided and help bartenders cut down on overpouring and remain consistent when crafting cocktails. They have different capacities on each end and range from 0.5 to 2.5 ounces.

tools.name: Muddler
tools.description: A tool used to mash or muddle herbs, fruits, and sugar cubes at the bottom of a glass to release their flavor. Commonly used in cocktails like Mojitos and Old Fashioneds.
